name: Spacebot (Poltergeisha, LittleMissLeeStories, milosst686, creativetherapyco, LoganDanielle94)
description:
Created for Buddy Up Jam Winter 2022 Description

Spacebot was sent to the Nu Solar System by NASU (Neo-human Aeronautics and Space Union) for one simple job: to harvest oxygen. But how can she do that when there are human colonies stranded here that need her help? Free 1000 human colonies and help them survive, using diplomacy, resource management, and hostile warfare.

Gameplay

Free captured human colonies, defend them from attack, and manage their resources! Your goal is to get to 1000 human colonies and (hopefully) keep them as healthy and happy as possible.

Theme

Spacebot meets the 1000 theme because her goal is to reach 1000 human colonies.

Controls

Mouse and Keyboard Users:
Arrows / WASD - Movement
Mouse Left click/ Spacebar - Aim. Shoot, Interact with UI controls

Gamepad Users:
Left Stick - Movement
Right Trigger  - Aim. Shoot, Interact with UI controls

Joystick:
Stick - movement
Trigger - Aim. Shoot, Interact with UI controls

Credits

Kathleen (@Leena42) - Artist / Programmer / Sound design

@milosst686 - Artist

Jaqui (@littlemissleestories) - Narrative Designer

Logan McGinnis - Writer

Poltergeisha - Music (https://linktr.ee/poltergeisha)

Audio SFX:
